data.name: Welcome
data.value: 🎮 Welcome to Tamagotchi Bot! Here you can raise your own virtual pet, play with him and compete with another players 🎮 Let's start!

data.name: ChooseName
data.value: 🧸 First of all you need to name your new friend Just type it here

data.name: ConfirmedName
data.value:
🧃 Cool! Your pet {0} is waiting 🐱
Schedule: 1️⃣ Have breakfast in the kitchen 🍳 2️⃣ Brush your teeth and take a shower 🛁 3️⃣ Play in the nursery (the pet really loves playing Apple🍎)
Don't forget to visit your pet, otherwise he may get offended and leave Have fun 🍿

data.name: PetCuringAnwserCallback
data.value: Your pet has been cured on {0}% 🌡 🧸 But joy decreased on {1}%

data.name: helpCommand
data.value:
🌈 Welcome to the world of Tamagotchi! 🌈 Here you can make yourself a new virtual friend 🐩🐈🐈‍⬛🐕 Be sure to keep track of your pet's progress: ▫️ play different games with him ⚽️ ▫️feed yummy 🍕🍳🍫 ▫️ take care of him 🍼 ▫️ take care and just love 😻
In the command menu you will find everything your pet needs 🌻 Visit your pet more often, because he loves you too and will be very happy to take you for a walk 🤍❤️🤍
FAQ: 1. How does the 🏅 level accumulate? - 1 experience = 1 minute of pet’s life. It’s enough not to forget about your pet 🦩
2. How to make money 💰? - Gold is earned at work (/work)
3. Can a pet die 💀? - Unfortunately, both in life and in Tamagotchi, a pet can be very offended and leave you 💔 Therefore, visit your virtual friend more often 🧸
/menu - almost all possible commands are here

data.name: menuCommand
data.value: What to do with pet: /pet - pet's status {0} /kitchen - feed your pet 🍕 /work - to earn more gold 💰 /sleep - bedroom 🧸 /gameroom entertainments 🎳 /ranks - see the best pets! 👑 /hospital - cure your pet 🏥 /bathroom - clean your pet 🛁 /referal - referral program 👩‍👩‍👧‍👦 /rename - to change name 🌀 /reward - to earn daily bonus 🎁 /changelog - official channel of Tamagotchi bot 🚀 /language - language 🇺🇸 | język 🇵🇱 | мова 🇨🇷 | язык 🇷🇺 /help - FAQ 🆘 There will be more in future! Stay tuned! 💝

data.name: FarewellText
data.value:
You have come to {0}, but all you see is an empty room and a note on the table: "My beloved friend {1}! It was very nice to spend time with you, but I've started feel not good. You should have kept an eye on me...❤️‍🩹"
Your pet left because he lacked care 💔

data.name: EpilogueText
data.value:
It happens to everyone, but life goes on! Maybe you'll be lucky with a new pet 😼
Try again? 🫶

data.name: ReminderNotifyText1
data.value:
{0}: You've come back! I've missed you so much! I want to eat 🌭 and play with you 🪁
/kitchen to feed 🍩 /gameroom for games 🏓

data.name: appleGameHelpText
data.value: The rules of the game are simple: the one who eats an unripe green apple will lose. You can choose to eat one 🍎, two 🍎🍎 or three 🍎🍎🍎 apples at a time Can you outplay your pet and leave him a tasteless 🍏?

data.name: appleGameUndefiendText
data.value: Choose one 🍎, two 🍎🍎 or three 🍎🍎🍎 apples to eat

data.name: appleGameLoseText
data.value:
Your green apple remains
{0}: Better luck next time 😉

data.name: changelog1Text
data.value: 👫 We remind you about the referral program 👭 It's more fun together, so invite your friends to join us in 🐾Tamagotchi🐾 Virtual GPT Pet🐾 You can get 1000💰 for every new friend! ➡️/referal Subscribe to our channel, where everything is about the bot: https://t.me/newsvirtualpetbot
